pageContext.title: Minus-One
pageContext.content:
Punk Rock veterans and one of the original founders of the Skate Rock genre. Formed during the stirrings of San Francisco Bay areas fertile punk scene. The band quickly built a worldwide fan base and gained notoriety with 1983’s four song inclusion on Thrasher Magazines Skate Rock Vol 1 (High Speed Productions).

Minus-One temporarily disbanded in 1986. They later reformed in 2006 with their 3 original founding members and signed with DC-Jam Records in 2008 to release their first full length record appropriately titled “The Kids Don’t Skate Here”.
